channel.title: Family on Aggregated Thinking
channel.description: Recent content in Family on Aggregated Thinking

item.title: Our daughter's happy 13th
item.description: Our daughter asked to celebrate her birthday a day ahead, with her 8th grade classmates. They had water gun and balloon fights, and bags of holi powder to throw around.

item.title: Christmas 2013
item.description: We decided to go to Cebu and spend Christmas this year with my parents and brother. I suppose it has been more than 15 years since we last celebrated Christmas together.

item.title: Kids on Photobooth
item.description: Miguel and Isabel goofing off in front of the laptop. They discovered the 4-shot option and started taking pictures by themselves.

item.title: Miguel, lately.
item.description: Since we moved apartments, the little man started doing facial expressions that always gets us wondering how he got them. I’ve tried capturing these expressions with a camera but it’s a lot harder than simply having the phone or the point-and-shoot handy at all times.

item.title: Ocean Park and around HK - April 2011
Disneyland, HK - April 2011
item.description: [gallery columns=“5” orderby=“post_date”] Comments: Was testing a plugin for Wordpress, but feel free … Jon Janairo Doblados - Nov 0, 2012Was testing a plugin for Wordpress, but feel free to view the pics anyway.

item.title: The Time (and Miguel's dance moves)
item.description: Miguel has this rather curious dance step somewhere just before the refrain of the dance track The Time (Dirty Bit) by BEP.

item.title: Dimsum again
item.description: We love Dimsum Diner, but we gotta start learning to keep ourselves from eating there too often. Why? We’re all high risk people, that’s why.

item.title: Breakfast after early morning church service
item.description: [[gallery orderby=“post_date”] ](http://jon.doblados.net/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/08012010.jpg.scaled1000.jpg) Comments: Miguel’s mama took one look at the pictures he… Jon Doblados - Aug 0, 2010Miguel’s mama took one look at the pictures here and decided to give him a haircut when we got home.

item.title: The things Miguel does on a usual day
item.description: miguel1.mp4 Watch on Posterous In a month or so he’ll be too big to fit in his laundry basket. He has his eye on the bigger hamper in our room.

item.title: Ever wondered how I look like after pulling an all-nighter?
After a busy afternoon of play, Ate Kysa attended to her brother and shared a meal with him.
item.description: via Gravity Comments: You’re so lucky Miguel. Cute ka na, may ate ka… Anonymous - May 6, 2010You’re so lucky Miguel.

item.title: Miguel's first giddyap!
item.description: 05202010.mp4 Watch on Posterous Spur of the moment thing. I was never really good with “anticipation” so didn’t take a better recording gadget with us.
